about_the_game:
Welcome to the Kitty Academy. Add numbers, memorize the plus and reach the goal. Reveal and prove that you got it right. Earn amazing Badges, Increase speed and level. It's a test for your brain. A simple game of mental skill, with 2 game modes, Classic and Advanced. Play and overcome to the limit.

Classic Mode.
Challenge your brain, guess the number. Just enjoy adding or test yourself by increasing the speed. Different students will accompany you in your sessions every day. Enjoy the game, is your choice.

Advanced Mode.
Manage your energy, increase your speed. Hit the number and compete against the students to achieve the advanced goals. Complete the race to climb faster.
- Kitty Race : Prestige Up!
- Master Numbers : Level Up!
- Friendly Rivals : Rank Up!

You've probably never tested your brain so hard with such a simple game. Moderation is recommended.

name: Grand Numbers Plus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5 3GHZ
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
